text: Employee of the Month is a talk show about dreamy careers. The host, Catie Lazarus, gives each guest the Employee of the Month Award. Each installment features guests with jobs of interest, ranging from television personalities and musicians to comedians and puppeteers. == Episodes == === 2011 === {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="width:100%;" |- style="color:white" !
